subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Chad Knaus and Steve Letarte were barred after Nascar technical inspectors found unapproved front fenders on their entries before a race in Sonoma, Calif., on June 24.
snippet: Chad Knaus and Steve Letarte were barred after Nascar technical inspectors found unapproved front fenders on their entries before a race in Sonoma, Calif., on June 24.
